poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Deals damage over time. Multiple applications increase intensity.

fire.name: Fire
fire.description: Deals fire damage over time. Re-applying refreshes the duration.

bleed.name: Bleed
bleed.description: Causes the target to bleed, taking damage over time. Stacks.

armor_break.name: Armor Break
armor_break.description: Reduces enemy armor, causing them to take increased damage from physical attacks.

vulnerability.name: Vulnerability
vulnerability.description: Makes the enemy vulnerable, causing them to take increased damage from all sources.

elemental_vulnerability.name: Elemental Vulnerability
elemental_vulnerability.description: Cursed enemies take massively increased damage from all sources.

//: These are positive status effects applied by support towers to other towers.
